Lyrics: Era.m requier sa costum' e son us
Poetic Translation: Now love exacts its dues in solid gold,

Lyrics: Amors, per cui plaing e sospir e veill,
Poetic Translation: So that I weep and lie awake and sigh,

Lyrics: C'a la genssor del mon ai quist conseill
Direct Translation: See Leonardo Malcovati's work at Trobar.org.
Poetic Translation: For on her words of counsel I rely:

Lyrics: E.m ditz q'ieu am tan aut cum puosc en sus
Poetic Translation: To love the best and highest I was told,

Lyrics: La meillor dompna, q'ella.m n'es fermanssa
Poetic Translation: And if I do, she gives her affirmation

Lyrics: C'onors e pretz m'er e pros e non dans;
Poetic Translation: I'll have no loss, but valor, worth, and praise,

Lyrics: E car ill es del mon la plus prezans
Poetic Translation: And since no one on earth can match her ways,

Lyrics: Ai mes en lieis mon cor e m'esperanssa.
Poetic Translation: She has my heart and hope and dedication.

Lyrics: Anc non amet tan aut cum eu negus
Poetic Translation: No higher love could ever lover hold;

Lyrics: Ni tant pro dompn', e car no.i trob pareill
Poetic Translation: Her peerlessness no person could deny.

Lyrics: M'enten en lieis e l'am al sieu conseill
Poetic Translation: I muse on her and with her laws comply,

Lyrics: Mais que Tisbe non amet Pyramus,
Poetic Translation: Like Thisbe Pyramus in arms would fold,

Lyrics: Que jois e pretz sobre totas l'enanssa,
Poetic Translation: For joy and wroth lift her above creation.

Lyrics: Qu'il es als pros plazens et acoindans
Poetic Translation: She to the valorous attention pays

Lyrics: Et als autres es d'orgoillos semblans,
Poetic Translation: And to the craven shows a haughty gaze;

Lyrics: Larga d'aver e de doussa coindanssa.
Poetic Translation: She gives without a trace of hesitation.

Lyrics: Anc Persivals qand en la cort d'Artus
Poetic Translation: Sir Perceval, who Arthur's court patrolled

Lyrics: Tolc las armas al cavallier vermeill
Poetic Translation: And stoutly with the Scarlet Knight did vie,

Lyrics: Non ac tal gauch cum eu del sieu conseill,
Poetic Translation: Did not rejoice as at her words do I;

Lyrics: E.m fai morir si cum mor Tantalus,
Poetic Translation: Like Tantalus, she makes me unconsoled,

Lyrics: Que so.m veda de que.m don' aondanssa
Poetic Translation: With others shares, but keeps me in frustration,

Lyrics: Midonz q'es pros, cortess' e benestans,
Poetic Translation: My lady brave and courtly in her ways,

Lyrics: Ric' e gentils, joves e ben parlans,
Poetic Translation: Both kind and noble, clever with a phrase,

Lyrics: E de bon sen e de bella semblanssa.
Poetic Translation: And young and fair and wise with contemplation.

Lyrics: Bella dompna, aitant arditz e plus
Poetic Translation: My lovely lady, I was far more bold,

Lyrics: Fui qan vos quis la joia del cabeill
Poetic Translation: When for a lock of hair I thought I'd try

Lyrics: E qe.m dassetz de vostr' amor consseill
Poetic Translation: And begged you tell me how to love and die,

Lyrics: No.n fo del saut a Tir Emenadus,
Poetic Translation: Than Emenadus stroming Tyre of old,

Lyrics: Mas a mi.n chai mais de pretz e d'onranssa
Poetic Translation: But my advance deserves more celebration,

Lyrics: Q'endreich d'amor fo l'ardimens plus grans;
Poetic Translation: Because in love the greater daring plays,

Lyrics: Mas ben deu far tal ardit vostr' amans,
Poetic Translation: In he who loves you fearlessness must blaze

Lyrics: Moira per vos o n'aia benananssa.
Poetic Translation: Toward death or bliss beyond this conflagration.

Lyrics: Ja mos Engles no.m blasme ni m'acus
Poetic Translation: Let not Engles accuse me, blame, or scold

Lyrics: Si.m loing per lieis d'Aureng' e del Monteill,
Poetic Translation: If for her sake Orange I bid goodbye,

Lyrics: C'aissi.m don Dieus del sieu bel cors conseill
Poetic Translation: Or fair Montélimar, for God on high

Lyrics: Cum las meillors valen de lieis en jus,
Poetic Translation: Above all others would her worth uphold.

Lyrics: E s'ieu fos reis d'Englaterr' o de Fransa
Poetic Translation: Were France or England in my domination,

Lyrics: Loignera m'en per far totz sos comans,
Poetic Translation: I'd leave it all, for her my heart obeys.

Lyrics: Q'en lieis es totz mos cors e mos talans
Poetic Translation: With her my heart in fervent longing stays;

Lyrics: Et es la res don plus ai desiranssa.
Poetic Translation: My soul for her is suffering starvation.

Lyrics: Belh Cavalier, en vos ai m'esperansa,
Poetic Translation: My Fairest Knight, you are my hope's foundation;

Lyrics: E quar vos es del mon la plus prezans
Poetic Translation: No braver personage the world displays.

Lyrics: E la plus pros, no mi deu esser dans
Poetic Translation: No harm shall I encounter all my days:

Lyrics: Quar vos mi des cosselh e.m fos fermansa.
Poetic Translation: You counseled me and were my compensation.

Lyrics: Na Beatritz de Monferrat s'enansa
Poetic Translation: The Lady Beatrice gains adulation

Lyrics: Quar totz bos faitz li van ades denans,
Poetic Translation: From valiant deeds that her admirers raise;

Lyrics: Per qu'ieu dauri ab sas lauzors mos chans
Poetic Translation: And thus I gild my verses with her praise

Lyrics: E trai m'enan ab sa belha semblansa.
Poetic Translation: And move to follow her, my inspiration.

Lyrics: Raimbaut de Vaqueiras
Poetic Translation: Carol Anne Perry Lagemann
